rukus.text: 16|41|baghaeleul bad-eun hu hananim-ui gil-eul ttala ijuhan ideul-ege hananim eun hyeonseeseodo ansigcheoleul jul geos-i myeo geudeul-i igeos-eul alge doel ttae nae se-ui bosang-eun deoug keulila
16|42|ideul-eun innaehan jadeul-imyeo geu deul junimkke uijihaneun ideul-ila
16|43|hananim-i geudae ijeon-edo seonjijadeul-eul bonaess-eudoe geudeul-eun hananim-egeseo gyesileul bad-eun ingan-ila neo huiga alji moshandamyeon hagjadeul-ege mul-eobola hasyeossnola

16|44|hananim-eun yejeung-gwa yulbeobseoleul geudeul-ege bonaess-eumyeo ttohan geudaeegemesejileul bonaessnani ineun geudaega mueos-i geudeul-ege gyesidoeeossneunji baegseongdeul-ege allila ham-ila amado geudeul-eun suggohalila

16|45|saagham-eul eummohan geudeul-i pyeong anhalyeo ham-inyo sillo hananimkkeseo daejilo hayeogeum geudeul-eul samkidolog halila ttohan geudeul-i alji moshaneun gos-eulobuteo beol-i geudeul-eul deopchidologhalila
16|46|geudeul-ui yeohaengjung-e geudeul-ege beol-i iss-eulila geuleona geudeul-eun pi hal su eobs-eumyeo
16|47|jeomchajeog-eulo dulyeobge hayeo geu deul-eul myeolmangke halila sillo junim-eun chinjeolgwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
16|48|geudeul-eun hananim-i changjohan mo deun samuldeul-eul balaboji ani haneu nyo geuui geulimjaneun oleunpyeongwa oenpyeon eulo giulmyeo gajang gyeomheohan jaselo hananim-eul gyeongbaeham-ila
16|49|haneul-e issneun modeun geosgwa daejiwiui modeun geos-i hananimman-eul gyeongbae hago cheonsadeuldo geuleohadoe omanhajianihago
16|50|geudeul moduga wie gyesineun junim-eul dulyeowo hago myeonglyeong bad-eundaelo haenghal ppun-ila
